title: App Lock (com.apple.app.lock)
description: The payload that configures a device to run a single app.

App.title: App
App.description: A dictionary that contains information about the app.

Options.title: Options
Options.description: A dictionary of options that the user can't change.

DisableTouch.title: Disable Touch
DisableTouch.description: If 'true', the system disables the touch screen. In tvOS, it disables the touch surface on the Apple TV Remote.

DisableDeviceRotation.title: Disable Device Rotation
DisableDeviceRotation.description: If 'true', the system disables device rotation sensing.

DisableVolumeButtons.title: Disable Volume Buttons
DisableVolumeButtons.description: If 'true', the system disables the volume buttons.

DisableRingerSwitch.title: Disable Ringer Switch
DisableRingerSwitch.description: If 'true', the system disables the ringer switch. When disabled, the ringer behavior depends on what position the switch was in when it was first disabled.

DisableSleepWakeButton.title: Disable Sleep Wake Button
DisableSleepWakeButton.description: If 'true', the system disables the sleep/wake button.

DisableAutoLock.title: Disable Auto Lock
DisableAutoLock.description: If 'true', the device doesn't automatically go to sleep after an idle period.

EnableInvertColors.title: Enable Invert Colors
EnableInvertColors.description: If 'true', the system enables Invert Colors.

EnableSpeakSelection.title: Enable Speak Selection
EnableSpeakSelection.description: If 'true', the system enables Speak Selection.

EnableMonoAudio.title: Enable Mono Audio
EnableMonoAudio.description: If 'true', the system enables Mono Audio.

EnableVoiceControl.title: Enable Voice Control
EnableVoiceControl.description: If 'true', the system enables Voice Control.

VoiceOver.title: Voice Over
VoiceOver.description: If 'true', the system allows the user to toggle VoiceOver.

Zoom.title: Zoom
Zoom.description: If 'true', the system allows the user to toggle Zoom.

InvertColors.title: Invert Colors
InvertColors.description: If 'true', the system allows the user to toggle Invert Colors.

AssistiveTouch.title: Assistive Touch
AssistiveTouch.description: If 'true', the system allows the user to toggle AssistiveTouch.

VoiceControl.title: Voice Control
VoiceControl.description: If 'true', the system allows the user to toggle Voice Control.
